titleStmt.title: A more full relation of the manner and circumstances of His Majesties departure from Hampton-Court. Written by Colonel Whaley, at the demand of the Speaker of the House of Commons, to whom it was lately sent, for the better satisfaction of the Parliament and kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Whalley, Edward, d. 1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert at the black spread-Eagle, neer the West-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the black spread-Eagle, neer the West-end of Pauls
